hello

first very nice prog.

my Idee

please give us a favorites tab. In which we can sort our most used items or makes the tabs bar by self-sorting keys Kombination.

At the moment it is very confused with mods.

It's a good idea, although I think it's probably been suggested before.

Part sorting probably needs an extensive overhaul - some decisions (such as RCS fuel and thrusters being in different groups) just strike me as weird.
Ooooh I like the idea of favouriting parts, It's annoying especially with mods like B9 with like 6 pages of structural parts, when all I want is a decoupler.

Thing is though, is that this would make people avoid looking into many parts. They'd make their list of favorites, 'all they'll ever need', and never look at or use anything else. Part of the reason they split parts up with the research unlocks was to help people become familiar with every part.

While I think the suggestion has merit, yes. I have used most every part and try them all on occasion, with very few exceptions (ion drives is the most obvious one I can think of, and the heavier yet otherwise exactly the same reaction wheel unit) I will continue to do so. Most of this is thanks to going very slowly through career mode and actually using all those parts out of necessity.
